full_text: Re: inmate From Lee Plourde To (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/07/12 10:53 Subject: Re: inmate Attachments: TEXT.htm Thank you (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) /12/2019 10:51 AM >> Good morning.
